attributes.action: Reward recyling by paying industries and householders to sort and transport their own recycled waste to a designated depot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils routinley sell recyclable plastic,metal and paper to the highest bidder. would it not make sense to pay consumers to recycle rather than punish those who do not recycle. The council would have all its transportation and sorting costs removed and would still be able to make a small profit
